learning_objectives.description: Define a single-table database from given data storage requirements

learning_objectives.notes_and_guidance: Including: text/alphanumeric, character, Boolean, integer, real, date/time.

learning_objectives.description: Understand the purpose of a primary key and identify a suitable primary key for a given database table
Read, understand and complete structured query language (SQL) scripts to query data stored in a single database table
learning_objectives.notes_and_guidance: Limited to: SELECT, FROM, WHERE, ORDER BY DESCENDING, ORDER BY ASCENDING, SUM, COUNT, AND, OR. Identifying the output given by an SQL statement that will query the given contents of a database table.
